nodes.text:
The Legacy era takes place between and after 37 ABY and 140 ABY.
Major events happened in this era, such as Jacen Solo's fall to the dark side and transformation into Darth Caedus, as well as the Second Galactic Civil War and the Sith–Imperial War. In the hole between the Fate of the Jedi book series and the Star Wars: Legacy comics, there are lots of unanswered questions: the downfall, redemption and return of the New Jedi Order, and the ultimate fates of characters such as Luke Skywalker, Leia Organa Solo, Han Solo, Ben Skywalker, Jaina Solo Fel, Allana Solo, R2-D2, C-3PO, and others.
